msContents.summary: Account. Covers two years and records expenditure for wages and other expenses

msItemStruct.note: Written across the fibers; on the recto, tax accounts (P.Princ. 53)
Col. I, 15 lines; col. II, 17 lines; complete?

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col. I] Account of the expenditures of Hypermenos together with Lucius; . . . of the same mother, of the 2nd year; . . . of Neron the Lord; . . . to Theon tabourios for cutting; [l. 5] . . . dr. 48; . . . of the half dr. 9; to Pnepheros, shepherd, of wages; by dr. 16 for 4 months, dr. 64; [l. 10] . . . of one workman, dr. 3; . . . dr. 3; . . . for the aratabia tax [[of the 3rd year]] of the 2nd year dr. 37 ob. 3; . . . of the same mother . . . dr. 10; for Pnepheros and those who are with him, dr. 5; [l. 15] . . . for the weaving wages, dr. 5 [col. II] Mesore. To Pouoris, trader, of Pabous, dr. 48; totals for the month of Mesore, dr. 140; this leaves for expenditures dr. 31 ob. 3; the 3rd year of Neron the Lord; [l. 5] expenditure; to Nemesionis s. of Titanos whose mother is Ta-, dr. 6.; for the price of wild chickling from Theoon for 1 art. dr. 3 ob. 3; from Philemon . . . dr. 16; for the seeds, 3rd year; [l. 10] for the price of hay through Apollos; s. of Sosipos [[silver dr. 32]] dr. . . .; for the price of hay and seeds, dr. . .; . . . for the price of seeds from the expenses . . . dr. . . .; 7th year 7th year; to Thyon tabourios for the price of fodder for cutting . . .; to Pnepheros, shepherd, of the month . . .; to . . . , shepherd, through Pnepheros

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. III 152 SB XX 14526 A. E. Hanson, "Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, Arabes and Ioudaioi in the First Century A.D. Tax Archive from Philadelphia: P.Mich. inv. 880 recto and P. Princ. III 152 revised," Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond, J. Johnson (ed.), (1992): 133-146
